EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Walter, Good to hear from you and thank you for the introduction. Lin – it’s nice to meet you via email. MBO is qualified to do direct business with the US Government; you can find our GSA schedule information here <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_GSA_Price_List.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1RYsl5W4vGYJaz%2Fhi2OeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. We mostly end up billing through large government integrators (i.e. BAH, Lockheed, Raytheon, SAIC etc.) as they are the ones to who have access to government opportunities. To my knowledge we only have one direct US Government client at this time; Millennium Challenge Corporation <http://www.mcc.gov/>, we have also worked with USAID i <http://www.usaid.gov/>n the past. So, to summarize, we have the credentials to work directly with the USG (especially within DOD) but usually end up going through an approved government integrator that already has the relationship. I hope this helps, please let me know I if you have any additional questions.
